hooks.command: python3 -c "import json,sys; p=json.load(sys.stdin).get('tool_input',{}).get('file_path',''); blocked=['.env','secrets','.git/','/prod/']; sys.exit(2 if any(b in p for b in blocked) else 0)"
jq -r '.tool_input.file_path' | { read f; [[ "$f" == *.ts || "$f" == *.tsx ]] && npx prettier --write "$f" 2>/dev/null; exit 0; }
jq -r '.message' | xargs -I{} osascript -e 'display notification "{}" with title "Claude Code"'
